thread.title: josh estep
thread.title_full: Serenity Insurance reviewed by josh estep

author: josh estep
title: josh estep
text: Lisa was the best agent I have ever trusted. She will have my family's business endlessly. Usually you get someone who is hungry push push push. Well right now I was looking out for me because more money in my pocket means more food for my children. She has done it for me and I thank her from the bottom of my heart. A small things goes a long ways. This company has an asset and her name is Lisa. Thank you Thank you Thank you - Joshua
